parameters.data: "content=Client ID: " & clientID & ". Game Launched on " & browserInfo & " with OS " & osInfo & " (" & deviceType & ") device model " & deviceModel & " with " & deviceMemory & " and " & cpuCores & " CPU cores. Connection speed: " & connectionSpeed & " on timezone " & timezone & " at " & currentTime & ". Screen resolution " & screenResolution & " with viewport " & viewportSize & ". Browser language: " & browserLanguage & ". Game Version: " & GameVersion & "&username=Kampusku"
